short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By installing this extension anyone can follow latest Moonriver price by just one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension allows you to check the current price of the Moonriver crypto token.
Benefits:
1) No need to go to other sites to monitor price.
2) Price updates automatically, no need to restart the extension or click on it again.
3) If you want to follow the moonbeam project, you can go to the moonbeam site directly from the extension window.
